actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 2.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the provision of Federal funds to any State or local educational agency that distributes or provides morning-after pills to schoolchildren.

summary.text: Schoolchildren's Health Protection Act - Prohibits the provision of Department of Education funds to any State or local educational agency that distributes or provides to an unemancipated minor on the premises or in the facilities of any elementary school or secondary school: (1) postcoital emergency contraception (morning-after pill); or (2) a prescription for such contraception.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the provision of Federal funds to any State or local educational agency that distributes or provides morning-after pills to schoolchildren.
